attributes.action: Make MPs have to stand for immediate re-election if they change political party
attributes.additional_details: If they change party they may no longer correctly represent the views of constituents who elected them.   I would suggest they should resign and seek re-election and the constituents of their original party should have the opportunity to put up a new candidate
attributes.background: During the last few months we have seen several MPs defect from the party they stood for and crossed sides in the House of Commons.
